messages.message: After uploading documents for creating my app, it gets stuck on this screen (link here (https://aihub.dev.instabase.com/apps/ai-hub/build/2e2eb858-458b-4583-a195-4e4f787b71bb)). After reloading it's still is stuck on the screen. From the network tab, it seems like run_sync is returning a `Exception Error communicating with OpenAI` error (maybe we should have the error pop up somehow?).
@Kathy Wu This will be addressed in next bundle today/tomorrow! @Siddhant has enabled tracing and error propagation from the backend which the UI can consume. cc: @Rakesh
@Kathy Wu is this error for class_suggest? Did you initially see an error next to classifying and now after reloading you are seeing the purple check mark?
no errors, it was just classifying for a few seconds and then it finished classifying but was stuck on the page
interesting. I think this is actually a front-end bug then. We should be showing that there was an error in classification
yep, I discovered the issue. Will put up a fix for this. We wonâ€™t show the exact error message but we should be showing that there was an error
